original_text: And David inquired of the Lord, “Shall I go up against the Philistines? Will you give them into my hand?” And the Lord said to David, “Go up, for I will certainly give the Philistines into your hand.”
korean_text: 다윗이 여호와께 여쭈어 이르되 내가 블레셋 사람에게로 올라가리이까 여호와께서 그들을 내 손에 넘기시겠나이까 하니 여호와께서 다윗에게 말씀하시되 올라가라 내가 반드시 블레셋 사람을 네 손에 넘기리라 하신지라

sentences.original_text: And David inquired of the Lord
Shall I go up against the Philistines?
Will you give them into my hand?
And the Lord said to David
for I will certainly give the Philistines into your hand
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 반드시 블레셋 사람을 네 손에 붙이리라
